message: Let's start fair, Bob.  I'll take the bigger share, but you get something to start.
Your turn, Alice.  I'm proposing a more even split this time.  It's still in your favor, but closer to fair.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it closer to 60/40, that's still a good deal for both of us.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a split that's even closer to your previous offer.  It's time to settle this.
